effects.display_string: (2) Set: Reversion's healing is increased by 10%, and it has a 50% chance to grant 1 additional stack of Temporal Compression.

name: Silken Advisor's Favor
description: To my most trusted advisors for their loyalty, wisdom, and above all - unity.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 429,649 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 238,182.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
